roleset.name: designation for a specific purpose
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, dedicate.01. Corresponds to VNcls dedicate-79.

example.name: all args
example.text: The spirit of the Divine Son was manifested in his self-dedication to the work.

example.name: just arg0
example.text: That the troops are still managing speaks very highly of their dedication and patriotism and they should be commended .

example.name: Mini Baryshnikov
example.text: Nikita Baryshnikov, 10, Alisa Reynya, 12, and Lena Takechi, 15, show that their young age says nothing about their dedication to the art.
